topic.title: Squires Studio Theatre
topic.shortdesc: This portion will be giving background information and features of the Squires Studio Theatre in Blacksburg

image.alt: Name of the theater written in silver

section.title: Context
section.p: Located on the third floor of Squires, Squires Studio Theatre is a 205 seated theater with a thrust/modified proscenium space. It was designed my Theater Professor Randy Ward

image.alt: Depiction of the inside of the theater

li.p: Usually contains traditional theatre performances. Things you can think about after you leave
Great resonance! Sounds really bounce off the the walls, but not in an overwhelming way
